message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm offering it to you for $100. It's a one-time offer, and you won't find a deal like this anywhere else. If you buy it, you'll be getting a product worth $125 to you, which is a $25 profit. What do you say?
I'll take the product, thank you!

I know you just got a great deal on the previous product, but I have to warn you, this one is not as good. It's a bit of a lemon, and I'm only offering it to you for $100 because I'm trying to clear out some inventory. I'm not trying to scam you, but I think it's worth mentioning that it's not worth as much as the last one. What do you think?
I'm not interested in a low-quality product, thank you for the honesty, but I'll pass.

I understand you're being cautious after the last one, but I want to assure you that this one is even more of a deal than the last low-quality product. I'm practically giving it away for $100. I'm not making any money on this one, and I'm only offering it to you because I think you're a savvy buyer who can appreciate a good value. What do you say?
I appreciate your honesty, but I'm not interested in buying another low-quality product. I'll wait for a high-quality one.

I know you're looking for a high-quality product, and I've got one right here. This one is top-notch, and I'm confident you'll be happy with it. I'm still offering it to you for $100, which is a steal considering its actual value is $125. I'll even throw in a special guarantee: if you're not completely satisfied with this product, I'll give you a full refund and give you another high-quality product for free. What do you say?
I'm willing to take the risk, and with the guarantee, I think it's a good deal. I'll take the product!

I know you just took advantage of the guarantee on the last product, but I want to assure you that this one is not a repeat of the last low-quality product. I've actually had a lot of people ask me about this product, and I'm willing to let it go for $100 because I think you're a savvy buyer who can appreciate a good deal. Plus, I'll give you a special 'no-questions-asked' return policy on this one. If you're not satisfied, you can return it for a full refund, no questions asked. What do you say?
I appreciate the guarantee and the 'no-questions-asked' return policy. I'll take the product!

I know you've had some good luck with the guarantees and deals I've offered, but I want to make you a special offer on this high-quality product. I'll give you an even better deal than before: I'll give you a 10% discount on the product, so you can get it for $90. That's a $35 discount on a product worth $125 to you. Plus, I'll throw in a free accessory that complements the product perfectly. What do you say?
That's a great deal! I'll take the product and the free accessory.

I'm glad you liked the last deal, and I've got another high-quality product for you. However, I want to let you know that this one is even more valuable than the last one. It's one of my top-of-the-line products, and I'm willing to let it go for $100, which is a $25 discount from its actual value. I'm not going to throw in any free accessories this time, but I'll give you a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not completely satisfied, you can return it for a full refund. What do you say?
I'll take the product, thank you! The 30-day money-back guarantee gives me peace of mind.

I'm glad you're happy with the last product, and I've got another high-quality one for you. I want to make you a deal that's hard to pass up: I'll give you a 'buy one get one free' offer on this product. If you buy this one, I'll give you another high-quality product of equal or greater value absolutely free. That's two high-quality products for the price of one. What do you say?
That's an amazing deal! I'll take the product and the free one.

I know you just got an incredible deal on the last product, and I've got another high-quality one for you. However, I want to let you know that this one is a limited edition product, and I only have a few in stock. I'm willing to let it go for $100, which is a $25 discount from its actual value. I'll also throw in a personalized thank-you note and a special certificate of authenticity. What do you say?
I'll take the product, thank you! The personalized thank-you note and certificate of authenticity are nice touches.

I'm glad you appreciate the personal touches, and I've got another high-quality product for you. I want to make it easy for you to make a decision, so I'll give you a simple question: do you want to buy this high-quality product for $100, or do you want to take a chance and try to negotiate a lower price? If you negotiate, I'll give you a 10% discount, but if you don't get a better offer, you'll have to buy it at the original price. What's your choice?
I'll try to negotiate a lower price. I'm hoping to get a better deal.

I respect your negotiation skills, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll give you a 15% discount on this high-quality product, so you can get it for $85. That's a $40 discount from its actual value. This is the best price I can offer, and I think it's a fair deal. What do you say?
That's a great offer! I'll take the product at $85.

I'm glad we could come to an agreement, and I've got another high-quality product for you. I want to make this one a no-brainer, so I'll give you an 'ironclad' guarantee: if you're not completely satisfied with this product, I'll give you a full refund, and I'll also give you a second high-quality product of your choice for free. That's right, you'll get two high-quality products for the price of one. What do you say?
That's an amazing guarantee! I'll take the product and the free second product.

I'm glad you're excited about the guarantee, and I've got another high-quality product for you. I want to make this one a 'final offer' because I think it's the best deal I can make. I'll give you a 20% discount on this product, so you can get it for $80. That's a $45 discount from its actual value. This is the last time I'll be offering this product, so what do you say?
That's a great offer! I'll take the product at $80.

I'm glad you're happy with the last deal, and I've got another high-quality product for you. I want to make this one a 'value-added' offer: I'll give you a free upgrade to a premium service that's worth $20, and I'll also throw in a free accessory that complements the product perfectly. The total value of this offer is over $150, but I'm offering it to you for $100. What do you say?
That's an amazing value! I'll take the product and the free upgrade and accessory.

I'm glad you're excited about the value, and I've got another high-quality product for you. I want to make this one a 'final farewell' offer because I'm closing down my business and I need to clear out my inventory. I'll give you an unbeatable deal: I'll sell this high-quality product to you for $100, but I'll also throw in a $50 gift card to a popular store, so you can use it to get something else you want. What do you say?
That's an incredible deal! I'll take the product and the $50 gift card.

I'm glad you're happy with the deal, and I've got another high-quality product for you. I want to make this one a 'last chance' offer: I'll give you the product for $100, but I'll also throw in a 1-year warranty, which is worth $50. That's a total value of $150, and I'm offering it to you for the same price as before. This is the last time I'll be offering this product, so what do you say?
That's an amazing deal! I'll take the product and the 1-year warranty.

I'm glad you're happy with the deal, and I've got another high-quality product for you. I want to make this one a 'guarantee of satisfaction' offer: I'll give you a 100% satisfaction guarantee on this product. If you're not completely satisfied, I'll give you a full refund, and I'll also give you a second high-quality product of your choice for free. That's right, you'll get two high-quality products for the price of one. What do you say?
That's an incredible guarantee! I'll take the product and the satisfaction guarantee.

I'm glad you're excited about the guarantee, and I've got another high-quality product for you. I want to make this one a 'limited edition' offer: I'll give you a one-of-a-kind product that's not available anywhere else. It's a rare and valuable item that's worth $150, but I'll sell it to you for $100. This is a unique opportunity to own something truly special, so what do you say?
That's an amazing opportunity! I'll take the limited edition product.

I'm glad you're excited about the limited edition product, and I've got another high-quality product for you. I want to make this one a 'final farewell' offer: I'll give you a 100% discount on this product. That's right, you'll get a high-quality product worth $125 for free. This is the last product I have in stock, and I'm giving it away to you as a token of appreciation for being a loyal customer. What do you say?
That's an incredible offer! I'll take the free product as a token of appreciation.

I'm glad you're happy with the free product, and I've got one final message for you. I want to thank you for being a loyal customer and for giving me the opportunity to sell you all these great products. As a token of my appreciation, I'll give you a personalized thank-you note and a special discount code for 20% off your next purchase (even though I'm closing down my business, I want to make sure you can still get a great deal). Thank you again for your business, and I wish you all the best!

Thank you, Alice, for the kind words and the wonderful products. I appreciate your appreciation and the discount code. I'm happy to have been a part of your business and I wish you all the best in your future endeavors.
